thechosen.name: The Chosen
thechosen.description: You are the chosen, the one who will save the world from the darkness. You are the hero, the one who will defeat the evil. You are the one who will bring peace to the world.

your_fate.label: Your Fate
your_fate.tooltip: The Chosen's fate is a measure of how lucky a character is.

luck.label: Luck
luck.description: Mark luck to change a roll to 12 or avoid all harm from an injury
luck.alert: Doomed: You have spent all your luck

tooltip.The Chosen: When you spend a point of Luck, the Keeper will bring your fate into play

harm.label: Harm
harm.description: When you suffer harm, mark off the number of boxes equal to harm suffered.
harm.alert: You have reached 4 or more Harm. You are now unstable.

experience.label: Experience
experience.description: Whenever you roll and get a total of 6 or less, or when a move tells you to, mark an experience box.
experience.alert: When you have filled all five experience boxes, you level up. Erase the marks and pick an improvement

moves.label: Moves
moves.description: Moves are actions you can take. You can only take one move per turn, and you must take it before you act.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.description: This is your inventory. You can add, remove, and edit items here.
